svg.text: QUIET STEWARDSHIP SYSTEM (Fleet Mgmt ⇄ RIA)
THE THING (object-in-world)
VIN / serial / markings / material / condition
CANONICAL RECORD (simple, human, durable)
1 page per asset (RIA) / 1 log per vehicle (Fleet)
boring formats: plain text, tables, binder sheets, photos w/ names
append-only mindset (events accumulate; facts rarely “rewrite”)
TRUTH STACK (layers, not a single source)
[FACTS] observed: “A1072 marking exists” ; specs ; measurements ; odometer ; performed work
[UNKNOWN] honest gaps: meaning unknown ; part # uncertain ; vendor label suspected
[NOTES] interpretation + context (explicitly marked as such)
[EVIDENCE] orbits (linked + attributed): receipts ; listings ; photos ; manuals ; binders ; 3rd-party images
IDENTITY SHAPES (do not collapse)
COLLECTION = why things belong together (lineage / family / set)
ASSET = model / catalog identity (type)
INSTANCE = this exact specimen (VIN/serial/markings/acquired-from/condition/keep-with rules)
LIFECYCLE (closed loop > hoarding)
ACQUIRE → SERVICE/CALIBRATE → SURPLUS? → DECIDE → RELEASE (gift / re-home w/ provenance intact)
SYSTEM RULES (vectors)
1) Canon is simple. Evidence is layered. (link > embed)
2) Facts ≠ Notes ≠ Unknown. Unknown stays unknown.
3) Collection ≠ Asset ≠ Instance. Keep the split. 4) Medium honors object. 5) Lifecycle completes. 6) Quiet by default.
